items.title: Replace node-wide line anchors with per-connection endpoint mapping

narrative.Background: The diagram needed explicit per-edge endpoint attachment points instead of one fixed side per statement card.
narrative.Problem: Node-wide anchors could not satisfy the requested connection-by-connection geometry.

items.title: Update SVG rendering and line hotspot placement to use per-pair endpoints

narrative.Background: Both rendered lines and clickable midpoint hotspots must use the same endpoint model to stay aligned.
narrative.Problem: Hotspots and lines would diverge if they were computed from different anchors.

narrative.Background: Anchor-mapping updates touched typed UI logic and required verification.
narrative.Problem: Without running project checks, type or behavior regressions could go unnoticed.
